data.text: @hkfp The muppet #HKgovt does it anyway. They don't care what works and what doesn't, its all about pleasing #CCPChina. Zero Covid at all costs, even if people die.
@Ultradeep3 @hkfp Masks did help. Even under Omicron. In theory all of these helped a little, it is just whether it is material enough to matter. I think you are right for most in your list.
@hkfp @chinIzumi Nor do masks, school closures, business closures, quarantines, travel bans, gathering restrictions etc etc etc
@hkfp #HongKong Is so messed up and will get even worst with Pooh on the rim…..
@getorga @hkfp @selina_cheng It is not a ban in the sense that Covid is entirely apathetic about what time it is.
@hkfp Noticeable effect on my wallet. I’m saving a ton of money

@hkfp while dine-in bans has highly noticeable detrimental effect on restaurants and businesses generally
This is like deploying nuclear bombs to kill cockroaches - every creature dies but cockroaches survive
@hkfp No shit Sherlock, a pot plant knew that much. Same with the face mask charade. Complete and utter rubbish.
